subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: The rookie Justin Wilson won his first IndyCar Series race, edging Hélio Castroneves in the Detroit Indy Grand Prix. Castroneves led for a majority of the road race on the Belle Isle course, but was penalized for blocking Wilson with fewer than 20 laps to go. The series points leader Scott Dixon finished fifth.
